mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, product_name, purchase_date, odometer, list_price, price_type, car_vin, car_contact, contact_phone, status, update_time, account_id) values (#{productId}, #{productName}, #{purchaseDate}, #{odometer}, #{listPrice}, #{priceType}, #{carVin}, #{carContact}, #{contactPhone}, #{status}, #{updateTime}, #{accountId})
mapper.update: update product set product_name = #{productName}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate}, odometer = #{odometer}, list_price = #{listPrice}, price_type = #{priceType}, car_vin = #{carVin}, car_contact = #{carContact}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, update_time = #{updateTime} where product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: select p.product_id as productId, p.product_name as productName, p.purchase_date as purchaseDate, p.odometer as odometer, p.list_price as listPrice, p.price_type as priceType, p.car_vin as carVin, p.car_contact as carContact, p.contact_phone as contactPhone, p.status as status, p.update_time as updateTime, p.account_id as accountId, pi.image_id as imageId, pi.name, pi.description, pi.size_jumbo as sizeJumbo, pi.size_large as sizeLarge, pi.size_regular as sizeRegular, pi.size_small as sizeSmall, pi.size_thumbnail as sizeThumbnail, pi.type, pm.model_id as modelId, pm.brand_name as brandName, pm.series_name as seriesName, pm.model_display_name as modelDisplayName, pm.series_id as seriesId, pm.brand_id as brandId, pa.address_id as addressId, pa.province, pa.city, pa.county, pa.street from product p left join product_image pi on pi.product_id = p.product_id left join product_model pm on pm.product_id = p.product_id left join product_address pa on pa.product_id = p.product_id where p.product_id = #{productId}

select p.product_id as productId, p.product_name as productName, p.update_time as updateTime, p.status as status, pi.size_thumbnail as sizeThumbnail from product p left join product_image pi on pi.product_id = p.product_id where p.account_id = #{accountId}
